title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 702.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 702.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

This regulation applies to all facilities and provider
agencies as defined in subdivision (4) of section
488
of the

Social Services Law and to all other entities that must screen individuals
against the staff exclusion list pursuant to subdivision (2) of section
495
of the

Social Services Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
702.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
